items.sentence: Tom and Mary seem to enjoy each other's company.
Tom offered the homeless man something to drink.
Tom looked at himself in the full-length mirror.
I can't afford to go to the cinema twice a week.
This stretch of the Autobahn has no speed limit.
I don't hang out with Tom as often as I used to.
I asked Tom to tell Mary what needed to be done.
If it rains tomorrow, we won't go to the picnic.
I've got something else I want to ask you to do.
Perhaps I'd better tell you about what happened.
